name: Creatures Within
description:
You explore a desolate land, attacked by creatures :)

Made only using already made Assets.

Controls

WASD - Walk
Shift - Run
Space - Jump
Tab - Talk
RightMouse - Aim (Optional)

ALL ASSETS

1)Snaps Prototype | Office - [Asset Store Originals]
2)Breakable Windows - [Gaik Software]
3)Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack - [JustCreate]
4)LowPoly Environment Pack - [K0RVEEN]
5)3rd Person Controller + Fly Mode - [Vinicius Marques]
6)City Voxel Pack - [POEME]
7)White City - [ALIYEREDON]
8)Simple Sky -Cartoon assets - [SYNTY Studios]
9)Humanoid Avatar Rig free - [FBXDOWNLOADS]
10)Fantastic Creature #1 - [Grigoriyarx]
